statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_id = 1000;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE location_id = 1 AND sale_amount > 100;
SELECT location_name, sale_date FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, location_name FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 10000
SELECT location_name, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM SalesData GROUP BY location_name ORDER BY avg_sale_amount DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM sales_by_location ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_by_location WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_by_location GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT product_id, inventory_quantity FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY inventory_quantity ASC;
SELECT sales_date, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_by_location WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY sales_date;
SELECT * FROM sales_by_location WHERE sales_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT location_id, product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_by_location GROUP BY location_id, product_id
SELECT location_id, product_id, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_by_location ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, sales_date ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT sl.location_id, il.product_id, sl.sales_amount, il.inventory_quantity FROM sales_by_location sl INNER JOIN inventory_levels il ON sl.product_id = il.product_id AND sl.location_id = il.location_id
SELECT location_id, product_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales, MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales, MIN(sales_amount) AS min_sales FROM sales_by_location GROUP BY location_id, product_id
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY city;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC, city ASC
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_name, quantity FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE state='California' AND city='Los Angeles'
SELECT * FROM sales JOIN locations ON sales.location_id = locations.location_id JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM location;
SELECT location_name, location_id FROM location ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE location_id = 5 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_available FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM location;
SELECT location_name, location_id FROM location ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_available FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity_available > 0;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity, product_name FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(quantity_available) AS total_quantity_available FROM inventory WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products
SELECT sale_id, product_id, location_id, sale_date, quantity FROM sales
SELECT dc_name, city, state, country FROM distribution_centers
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM locations WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT s.sale_id, p.product_name, l.location_name, s.sale_date, s.quantity FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN locations l ON s.location_id = l.location_id;
